relation.text: the time of fashio na ble folk is to me far more tiresome than even the repeated strol in the same path by the same river , with the same Woman -- my idea of the marriage state is this -- he is happyest that has the smallest ground for regret , for as to being always in love , 't is something like being always hungry which is impoſſible -- now
plyed my gentleman in head or Stomach with Tinc . Rhab . ȝ . S . I am now
drink a pint of Madeira & a fig for the Doctor -- I have been my own Esculapius -- Nervous gout indeed -- a novel term well done Master Turton -- 4 Weeks
say you , Dr. Turton ? I am within 3 years
